5 5 52   PAW 
  This command generates '.kumac' file which  
contains instructions of  PAW graphical system.
In particular it  contains instruction to read 
plotDataFile generated by  upper level menu 
function. Extention of plotDataFile is replaced on
'.kumac'. The user can edit the 'kumac'file to 
improve  plot visualization. The  PAW  session 
includes  the following  commands: 

    > pawX11
    Workstation type (?=HELP) <CR>=1 : 1 
    PAW> exec plotDataFile
    PAW> exit

PAW session generates file plotDataFile.eps
